vga_eth_capture.v

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001  /*
00002 Send UDP packet:
00003 ethernet
00004     dest mac(6), src mac(6), type(2 = 0x0800 IPv4)
00005 ip
00006     version,header([1] = 0x45), tos([1] = 0x00), length([2] = 4*5 + 4*2 + len = 990 = 0x03DE)
00007     id([2] = 0x0000), flags,offset([2] = 0x40, 0x00)
00008     ttl([1] = 0x0F), protocol([1] = 0x11), header checksum([2] = 0)
00009     source ip([4])
00010     dest ip([4])
00011 udp
00012     source port([2]), dest port([2])
00013     length([2] = 8 + len = 970 = 0x03CA), checksum([2] = 0)
00014 data
00015     (len = line num(2) + line(640*12/8 = 960) = 962)
00016 
00017 --full ethernet packet len = 990 + 14 = 1004 = 0x03EC
00018 
00019 DM9000A control to send:
00020     set IMR(FFh = 0x80)
00021     
00022     set checksum reg (31h = 0x05)
00023     
00024     set early transmit (30h = 0x83) ? threshold 75%
00025     
00026     power-up PHY (1Fh = 0x00)
00027     
00028     dummy MWCDM ?
00029     
00030     DO
00031     
00032         packet I
00033         set MWCMD(F8h = 16-bit data) 
00034         
00035         wait for packet II
00036         read TX(02h bit 0 == 0)
00037         
00038         set TXPLL(FCh = low byte)
00039         set TXPLH(FDh = high byte)
00040         
00041         write TX(02h 0x01)
00042         
00043         packet II
00044         set MWCMD(F8h = 16-bit data) 
00045         
00046         wait for packet I
00047         read TX(02h bit 0 == 0)
00048         
00049         set TXPLL(FCh = low byte)
00050         set TXPLH(FDh = high byte)
00051         
00052         write TX(02h 0x01)
00053     
00054     LOOP
00055     
00056 */
00057 
00058 module vga_capture(
00059     input clk_30,
00060     input clk_25,
00061     input reset_n,
00062     
00063     // vga read burst
00064     input [9:0] vga_r,
00065     input [9:0] vga_g,
00066     input [9:0] vga_b,
00067     input display_valid,
00068     
00069     // DM9000A ethernet
00070     output enet_clk_25,
00071     output enet_reset_n,
00072     output enet_cs_n,
00073     input enet_irq,
00074     
00075     output reg enet_ior_n,
00076     output reg enet_iow_n,
00077     output reg enet_cmd,
00078     inout [15:0] enet_data 
00079 );
00080 assign enet_clk_25  = clk_25;
00081 assign enet_reset_n = reset_n;
00082 assign enet_cs_n    = 1'b0;
00083 
00084 reg tx_active;
00085 
00086 reg enet_data_oe;
00087 reg [15:0] enet_data_out;
00088 assign enet_data = (enet_data_oe == 1'b1)? enet_data_out : 16'bZ;
00089 
00090 //************ packet Ethernet and IP/UDP header contents ROM
00091 reg [5:0] ram_addr;
00092 wire [15:0] ram_q;
00093 
00094 altsyncram ethernet_ram_inst(
00095     .clock0(clk_30),
00096     .address_a(ram_addr),
00097     .q_a(ram_q)
00098 );
00099 defparam
00100     ethernet_ram_inst.operation_mode = "ROM",
00101     ethernet_ram_inst.width_a = 16,
00102     ethernet_ram_inst.widthad_a = 6,
00103     ethernet_ram_inst.init_file = "vga_eth_capture.mif";
00104 
00105 //************ vga burst fifo
00106 reg [8:0] vga_line_number;
00107 reg last_display_valid;
00108 reg [1:0] select_line;
00109 reg block_wrreq;
00110 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00111     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00112         vga_line_number <= 9'd0;
00113         last_display_valid <= 1'b0;
00114         select_line <= 2'd0;
00115         block_wrreq <= 1'b0;
00116     end
00117     else begin
00118         last_display_valid <= display_valid;
00119         
00120         if(fifo_empty == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b0 && display_valid == 1'b1)   block_wrreq <= 1'b1;
00121         else if(display_valid == 1'b0)                                                  block_wrreq <= 1'b0;
00122         
00123         if(display_valid == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b1) begin
00124             if(vga_line_number == 9'd479)   vga_line_number <= 9'd0;
00125             else                            vga_line_number <= vga_line_number + 9'd1;
00126         end
00127         
00128         if(display_valid == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b1 && vga_line_number == 9'd479) select_line <= select_line + 2'd1;
00129     end
00130 end
00131 
00132 wire fifo_wrreq = (fifo_empty == 1'b1 || last_display_valid == 1'b1) && block_wrreq == 1'b0 && display_valid == 1'b1 && select_line == vga_line_number[1:0];
00133 wire start_load = fifo_empty == 1'b0;
00134 
00135 wire fifo_empty;
00136 wire [11:0] fifo_q;
00137 
00138 scfifo vga_fifo_inst(
00139     .clock(clk_30),
00140     .data( { vga_r[9:6], vga_g[9:6], vga_b[9:6] } ),
00141     .wrreq(fifo_wrreq),
00142     .rdreq(fifo_rdreq),
00143     
00144     .empty(fifo_empty),
00145     .q(fifo_q)
00146 );
00147 defparam
00148     vga_fifo_inst.lpm_width = 12,
00149     vga_fifo_inst.lpm_numwords = 1024;
00150 
00151 reg fifo_rdreq;
00152 reg [1:0] fifo_rd_cnt;
00153 reg [11:0] last_fifo_q;
00154 
00155 //************
00156 
00157 reg [15:0] state_counter;
00158 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00159     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00160         state_counter   <= 16'd0;
00161         tx_active       <= 1'b0;
00162         
00163         enet_iow_n      <= 1'b1;
00164         enet_ior_n      <= 1'b1;
00165         enet_cmd        <= 1'b0;        // low: INDEX, high: DATA
00166         enet_data_oe    <= 1'b0;
00167         enet_data_out   <= 16'd0;
00168         
00169         ram_addr        <= 6'd0;
00170         
00171         fifo_rdreq      <= 1'b0;
00172         fifo_rd_cnt     <= 2'd0;
00173         last_fifo_q     <= 12'd0;
00174     end
00175     else if(state_counter == 16'd50000) begin
00176         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00177         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00178         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00179         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFF }; // set IMR(FFh = 0x80)
00180         
00181         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00182     end
00183     else if(state_counter == 16'd50002) begin
00184         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00185         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00186         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h80 }; 
00187         
00188         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00189     end
00190     else if(state_counter == 16'd50005) begin
00191         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00192         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00193         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h1F }; // power-up PHY (1Fh = 0x00)
00194         
00195         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00196     end
00197     else if(state_counter == 16'd50007) begin
00198         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00199         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00200         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h00 }; 
00201         
00202         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00203     end
00204     
00205     else if(state_counter == 16'd50010) begin
00206         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00207         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00208         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h31 }; // set checksum reg (31h = 0x05)
00209         
00210         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00211     end
00212     else if(state_counter == 16'd50012) begin
00213         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00214         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00215         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h05 }; 
00216         
00217         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00218     end
00219     
00220     
00221     else if(state_counter == 16'd50018) begin
00222         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00223         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00224         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hF8 }; // set MWCMD(F8h = 16-bit data) 
00225         
00226         ram_addr <= 6'd0;
00227         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00228     end
00229     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50020 && state_counter <= 16'd50060 && state_counter[0] == 1'b0) begin
00230         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00231         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00232         enet_data_out <= ram_q;
00233         
00234         ram_addr <= ram_addr + 6'd1;
00235         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00236     end
00237     else if(state_counter == 16'd50062) begin
00238         if(start_load == 1'b1) begin
00239             enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00240             enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00241             enet_data_out <= { 7'd0, vga_line_number };
00242             
00243             fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00244             fifo_rd_cnt <= 2'd0;
00245             state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00246         end
00247     end
00248     else if(state_counter == 16'd50063) begin
00249         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00250         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00251         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00252         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00253     end
00254     
00255     
00256     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b0) begin
00257         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00258         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00259         
00260         if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd0)     enet_data_out <= { fifo_q[3:0], last_fifo_q }; 
00261         else if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd1)enet_data_out <= { fifo_q[7:0], last_fifo_q[11:4] };
00262         else                        enet_data_out <= { fifo_q, last_fifo_q[11:8] };
00263         
00264         if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd2) fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00265         else                    fifo_rdreq <= 1'b0;
00266         
00267         fifo_rd_cnt <= fifo_rd_cnt + 2'd1;
00268         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00269         
00270         if(state_counter == 16'd51022)  state_counter <= 16'd60016 - 16'd1;
00271         else                            state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00272     end
00273     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b1 && fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd3) begin
00274         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00275         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00276         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00277         fifo_rd_cnt <= 2'd0;
00278         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00279     end
00280     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b1) begin
00281         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00282         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00283         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00284     end
00285     
00286     
00287     else if(state_counter == 16'd60016) begin
00288         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00289         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00290         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00291         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h02 }; // read TX(02h bit 0 == 0)
00292         
00293         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00294     end
00295     else if(state_counter == 16'd60018) begin
00296         enet_ior_n <= 1'b0;
00297         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00298         enet_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00299         
00300         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00301     end
00302     else if(state_counter == 16'd60020) begin
00303         enet_ior_n <= 1'b1;
00304         tx_active <= enet_data[0];
00305         
00306         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00307     end
00308     else if(state_counter == 16'd60022) begin
00309         if(tx_active == 1'b0)   state_counter <= 16'd60118;
00310         else                    state_counter <= 16'd60016;
00311     end
00312     
00313     else if(state_counter == 16'd60118) begin
00314         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00315         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00316         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00317         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFC }; // set TXPLL(FCh = low byte)
00318         
00319         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00320     end
00321     else if(state_counter == 16'd60120) begin
00322         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00323         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00324         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'hEC }; 
00325         
00326         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00327     end
00328     
00329     else if(state_counter == 16'd60123) begin
00330         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00331         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00332         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFD }; // set TXPLH(FDh = high byte)
00333         
00334         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00335     end
00336     else if(state_counter == 16'd60125) begin
00337         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00338         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00339         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'h03 }; 
00340         
00341         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00342     end
00343     
00344     else if(state_counter == 16'd60128) begin
00345         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00346         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00347         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h02 }; // write TX(02h = 0x01)
00348         
00349         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00350     end
00351     else if(state_counter == 16'd60130) begin
00352         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00353         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00354         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'h01 }; 
00355         
00356         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00357     end
00358     
00359     else if(state_counter == 16'd60132) begin
00360          state_counter <= 16'd50018;
00361     end
00362     
00363     else if(state_counter <= 16'd60132) begin
00364         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00365         enet_ior_n <= 1'b1;
00366         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b0;
00367         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00368     end
00369     
00370 end
00371 
00372 endmodule
